employee_tasks.title: Complete Q1 Self-Assessment
employee_tasks.description: Fill out the self-assessment form for Q1 performance review
employee_tasks.notes: Please refer to the updated performance metrics

employee_tasks.title: Complete Marketing Analytics Course
employee_tasks.description: Finish the online marketing analytics certification course
employee_tasks.notes: The certification exam needs to be scheduled separately

employee_tasks.title: Update Client Contact Information
employee_tasks.description: Review and update all client contact information in the CRM system
employee_tasks.notes: Focus on the clients in the West region first

employee_tasks.title: Complete Team Performance Reviews
employee_tasks.description: Conduct and document performance reviews for all team members
employee_tasks.notes: Schedule individual meetings with each team member

employee_tasks.title: Process New Hire Paperwork
employee_tasks.description: Process and file all paperwork for new hires starting next month
employee_tasks.notes: There are 5 new hires scheduled to start on April 1

employee_tasks.title: Product Knowledge Training
employee_tasks.description: Complete training on the new product features launching next month
employee_tasks.notes: You'll need to be ready to support customers on these features by April 1

employee_tasks.title: Finalize Q2 Marketing Plan
employee_tasks.description: Complete and submit the Q2 marketing plan and budget
employee_tasks.notes: Include the new product launch campaign in the plan

employee_tasks.title: Sales Team Weekly Report
employee_tasks.description: Compile and submit the weekly sales performance report

employee_tasks.title: Employee Engagement Survey
employee_tasks.description: Prepare and distribute the quarterly employee engagement survey
employee_tasks.notes: Make sure to include the new questions about remote work preferences

employee_tasks.title: Code Review for Product Release
employee_tasks.description: Complete code review for all features in the upcoming product release
employee_tasks.notes: Focus on security and performance aspects
